attributes.action: allow Taxpayers to enter a free ballot for 2012 Games tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that at present over 65% of the cost of the Olympics will be paid for by the tax payer, each tax payer should be entered into a national lottery to receive a free ticket to an Oylmpic event. 
The percentage of tickets allocated should be equal to the final percentage of taxpayer burden by the end of 2011.
